tasks.task: Setting up a healing chamber for grafting tomatoes
subtasks: Excluding light from the healing chamber
Timing grafting process for optimal water stress
Using sterile equipment (razor blade, grafting clips)
Cutting both rootstock and scion at 45-degree angles
Securing scion to rootstock with grafting clip
Planting grafted plants in healing chamber immediately
Watering under the bottom of the chamber
Monitoring stressed appearance and improving conditions
Preparing plants for field transplant after 2 weeks
Ensuring graft union is not buried when planting
